What determines the latitude for a pushed roll?
Actions, motivations, and events within the game.

Why are the consequences of a failed pushed roll extreme?
Because the investigator is insane while performing a task.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of providing example consequences for pushing a skill roll while insane?
The purpose is to provide ideas, and it is intended that both players and Keepers fashion their own justifications and consequences as appropriate to their games and playing styles.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are combined skill rolls typically handled?
Only one dice roll is made; the result is then compared with each of the skills named.

What happens when the Keeper asks for a roll against more than one skill?
Only one dice roll is made, and the result is then compared with each of the skills named.

A successful Spot Hidden would allow him to see the gun being drawn by the cultist.
